description: Yeehaa is a seasoned tech manager and consultant with a diverse background in software engineering and project management. Their expertise spans multiple industries, driving significant upgrades and implementations. Yeehaa's work focuses on ecosystem architecture, innovation, and sustainable design. They've written insightful blog posts on topics like biological ecosystems, internet fragmentation, and regenerative innovation. Yeehaa also curated a course on ecosystem grooming, emphasizing leadership, adaptability, and creativity. Their approach combines academic knowledge with practical experience to foster innovation and efficiency in complex, interconnected systems.
blurb: Yeehaa, a tech manager and consultant, explores ecosystem architecture and innovation. Their work spans from biological ecosystems to internet fragmentation, emphasizing sustainable design and regenerative practices for a resilient future.
